message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $130. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but $130 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
